init-db:
create schema target; SET search_path = target, pg_catalog;
create table hospital( oid serial, providerNumber varchar(50), hospitalName varchar(50), address1 varchar(50), address2 varchar(50), address3 varchar(50), city varchar(50), state varchar(50), zip varchar(50), country varchar(50), phone varchar(50), hospitalType varchar(50), hospitalOwner varchar(50), emergencyService varchar(50), condition varchar(50), measureCode varchar(50), measureName varchar(200), score varchar(50), sample varchar(50), stateAvg varchar(50) );
